desc: The Samuel product line is designed to give men and women a superior look. Created by celebrity hair styalist and owner of the Martinaze Samuel Salon in West Hollywood California, Hair By Samuel products have been perfected throughout Samuel’s career. When you look good. We look good.

layout.text: Good hair is all about balance. You want it laid-back but not messy, tousled but not sloppy. California-based hair product line Samuel gets the job done for you, bringing you a plastic-free, eco-friendly good hair day every day, no matter your cut, style, or level of expertise. It’s all about maximum results with minimal effort. No one does laid-back, environmentally sound style better than California, after all. And no one does hair better than us.
